import styles from "./BillingDetailForm.module.css"; const BillingDetailForm = () => { const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const billingDetail = { name: data.get("full-name"), email: data.get("email"), phone: data.get("phone"), address: data.get("address"), }; window.alert( `Your order is done : /nName : ${billingDetail.name} /nEmail : ${billingDetail.email} /nPhone : ${billingDetail.phone} /nAddress : ${billingDetail.address}` ); }; return ( <>

); }; export default BillingDetailForm;
